text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
choice_data_list: It was your best race so far.
It was your best race so far.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hehe～, I even surprised myself! To beat 
the “Yayoi Prize” record time!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
When I saw Taishin come up, some strength 
welled up from inside me…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
A rival is a presence that brings out the power 
that you do not even notice yourself, and Taishin 
was the one who taught me that, Waaaa!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well,I lost… I feel like I had a good race.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Geez, It's not fair, both of you. I 
also wish I could run with you.

If this goes on, the 3 girls will surely race in their first 
classic race together at the “SatsukiShou”.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Next time I will make sure I don't lose. No matter how good the 
race was, there is no point if you don't win.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
haha, I will also make sure to appear at the “SatsukiShou”. And 
this time we will run together all 3 of us.

First Rival Showdownー Winning Ticket that ran win her rival 
showed a bigger smile than ever before.

From now on, the once in a lifetime showdown, the classic front 
begins and the goal of the Derby is slowly approaching.
